short_summary: SBIPS: Stream 2. Enterprise Resource Planning/Client/Customer Relationship Managers
description: NRC’s Human Resources Branch (HRB) is undertaking a project to transition from SAP SuccessFactors (SF) Onboarding 1.0 module to their newest version Onboarding (a.k.a. Onboarding 2.0). NRC will engage a SuccessFactors (SF) certified partner (Proponent) with experience implementing this module for Canadian SF customers.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Enterprise Resource Planning/Client/Customer Relationship Managers for National Research Council

## Tender Details

* Tender Number: 23-58283
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: 23-58283
* Publication Date: April 30, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 31, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: May 31, 2024

## Description
The Human Resources Branch of the National Research Council is seeking a certified SuccessFactors partner to assist in transitioning from SAP SuccessFactors Onboarding 1.0 to the newest version, Onboarding 2.0. The Proponent is required to have experience implementing this module for Canadian SuccessFactors customers.

## Contract Information

* Contract Start Date: June 24, 2024
* Contract End Date: June 23, 2025
* Regions of Opportunity: Ottawa
* Regions of Delivery: Ottawa
* Contracting Entity: National Research Council

## Selection Criteria
The Proponent will be selected based on a combination of technical merit and price.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is open to suppliers who have entered into the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Tender Documents
The tender documents can be found at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37252/23-58283_npp.pdf

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact Philippe G. Cléroux at phillippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca or (613) 998-1073. 1220 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6.

Note: I rewrote the entire text to only include relevant information, making it more concise and easier to read. I also ensured that there are no grammatical errors.
